column4: hi folks, i need to clean up some space in my /boot, is it safe to delete the  vmlinuz-2.6.20-15-generic initrd.img-2.6.20-15-generic files?
if you arent booting it yes.  uname -a in term to check but you can also remove it in synaptic cleanly
i'll leave it to things smarter than me (synaptic) then :P
